title: Unclosed HTML Tags - Missing </article> Tag
description: The homepage HTML has structural issues with unclosed tags. Specifically, the `<article class="widget widget__login">` tag is opened but never properly closed. The page ends with `</html>` without closing the article tag, which violates proper HTML5 structure and semantics. This represents a malformed HTML structure that can cause issues with rendering, styling, and accessibility across different browsers and user agents.
impact: While browsers have error recovery mechanisms and will attempt to auto-close unclosed tags, this malformed HTML can lead to: (1) Inconsistent rendering across different browsers, (2) Issues with CSS styling that relies on proper DOM hierarchy, (3) Accessibility problems with semantic HTML readers and screen readers, (4) Potential parsing inconsistencies in different contexts, (5) Confusion for developers maintaining the codebase regarding proper HTML structure
